DOC.brief_summary: This study aim elucidate association Pain Catastrophizing Scale Score Postspinal Headache Patients Underwent Cesarean Section With Spinal Anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Pain Catastrophizing Scale Score Postspinal Headache
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim elucidate association Pain Catastrophizing Scale Score Postspinal Headache Patients Underwent Cesarean Section With Spinal Anesthesia . Patients ask fill questionnaire booklet include Pain Catastrophizing Scale , Beck Depression Inventory Beck Anxiety Inventory elective cesarean section preoperative room operate theater . In postoperative second fourth day , patient call phone ask headache complaint . The intensity headache evaluate use visual analog scale . Age , gender , visual analog scale score record .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists score I , II , III without history cerebrovascular disease without presence psychiatric disease severe liver , kidney cardiovascular disease peripheral arterial disease history allergy local anesthetic patient without cooperation participate study presence neurologic neuromuscular disease
